TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DataControlFieldCollection extends System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection
Public NotInheritable Class DataControlFieldCollection Inherits StateManagedCollection
public ref class DataControlFieldCollection sealed : System::Web::UI::StateManagedCollection

summary.span: 表示数据绑定控件（如 和 ）使用的 对象的集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of objects that are used by data-bound controls such as and .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类表示一系列对象数据绑定控件用于指定其子控件的呈现方式。The class represents a collection of objects used by data-bound controls to specify how their child controls are presented. 类派生自，特别是用于存储的抽象基集合类对象。The class derives from , an abstract base collection class used specifically to store objects. 一个产生影响的对象对象。A object influences the behavior of a object. 还原状态时，将重新添加到该控件动态添加到集合中的对象。 objects that are dynamically added to the collection will be re-added to the control when state is restored. 这意味着，一个字段需要添加、 删除，或在每个回发时，只需一次更改而不是因为在 ASP.NET 中的大多数集合类型要求。This means that a field needs to be added, removed, or changed just once instead of on each postback, as most collection types in ASP.NET require. (类实现接口，使它能够在 ASP.NET 视图状态中存储其状态。(The class implements the interface, which enables it to store its state in ASP.NET view state. )) 使用类以编程方式管理的一组对象。Use the class to programmatically manage a set of objects. 请注意，更常见的是以声明方式定义这些字段。Note that it is more common to define these fields declaratively. 可以添加、 插入和移除对象使用的相应方法类。You can add, insert, and remove objects using the appropriate methods of the class. 若要以编程方式检索对象从一个集合，使用以下方法之一：To programmatically retrieve objects from a collection, use one of following methods: - 使用索引器获取单个中使用数组表示法的集合对象。Use the indexer to get a single object from the collection using array notation. - 使用方法来创建-实现的对象，然后可用于从集合中获取项。Use the method to create a -implemented object, which can then be used to get items from the collection. 属性集合中指定的项总数和通常用于确定集合中的上限。The property specifies the total number of items in the collection, and is commonly used to determine the upper bound of the collection. 可以将项添加到和从集合中使用删除的项， ， ，和方法。You can add items to and remove items from the collection using the , , , and methods. 如果使用的或控件，自动创建的对象 (例如，当属性是`true`) 不会存储在可公开访问的字段集合。If you are using the or control, the objects that are automatically created (for example, when the property is `true`) are not stored in the publicly accessible fields collection. 仅可以访问和处理不自动生成的对象。You can only access and manipulate objects that are not automatically generated. 下表列出了不同的数据控件字段类以及如何使用它们。The following table lists the different data control field classes and how they are used. |参数类Parameter Class|描述Description| |---------------------|-----------------| ||对于所有字段的抽象基类。The abstract base class for all fields.| ||从 ASP.NET 数据源控件检索用于绑定到文本或数据的数据绑定控件字段。A data-bound control field that is used to bind to text or data retrieved from an ASP.NET data source control.| ||数据绑定控件字段，它封装常规按钮功能。A data-bound control field that encapsulates general button functionality. 和从其派生。 and are derived from it.| ||数据绑定控件字段，它显示了至少一个按钮。A data-bound control field that displays at least one button.| ||显示绑定数据控件字段控件。A data-bound control field that displays a control.| ||显示可以对所显示的行 （或列），如数据执行的操作编辑、 更新或删除数据绑定控件字段。A data-bound control field that displays actions that can be performed on the data displayed by the row (or column), such as edit, update, or delete.| ||显示绑定数据控件字段控件。A data-bound control field that displays a control.| ||显示绑定数据控件字段控件。A data-bound control field that displays an control.| ||数据绑定控件字段的数据绑定控件中显示自定义内容。A data-bound control field that displays custom content in a data-bound control.|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数创建的新实例类。Use this constructor to create a new instance of the class. > [!NOTE] > 主要由控件开发人员使用此构造函数。This constructor is used primarily by control developers.

summary.span: 将指定的 对象追加到集合末尾。

span.span: Appends the specified object to the end of the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法以追加到集合末尾的对象。Use the method to append a object to the end of the collection. 此实现该方法采用由指定的对象`field`参数并将其追加到集合。This implementation of the method takes the object specified by the `field` parameter and appends it to the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法将动态添加对象传递给控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to dynamically add a object to a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[CheckBoxFieldCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CheckBoxFieldCtor/CS/checkboxfieldctorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CheckBoxFieldCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CheckBoxFieldCtor/VB/checkboxfieldctorvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法来创建当前集合的副本。Use the method to create a copy of the current collection. 此方法主要由设计时对话框用于实现回退行为时取消操作。This method is used primarily by design-time dialog boxes to implement rollback behavior when an operation is canceled.
